title: Shell Games: Climate, Inflation And The McRib 10.31.22
itunes:title: Shell Games: Climate, Inflation And The McRib 10.31.22
description:
In episode 1362, Jack and Miles are joined by song writer, actor, and star of Barbarian, Matthew Patrick Davis, to discuss… Update on Inflation / Climate Change, On Same Day As Apocalyptic Climate Report From UN--NYTimes Drops Article Spiking Football On How Well We’ve Turned It Around, The McRib Is The Streisand Of Sandwiches and more!

  1. Update on Inflation / Climate Change
  2. These Top 5 Oil Companies Just Raked In $35 Billion While Americans Pay More at the Pump
  3. On Same Day As Apocalyptic Climate Report From UN--NYTimes Drops Article Spiking Football On How Well We’ve Turned It Around
  4. The McRib Is The Streisand Of Sandwiches
  5. Military Experiments, Food Conspiracies, and 'The Flintstones:' The History of the McRib
  6. A Conspiracy of Hogs: The McRib as Arbitrage
  7. From Bob Seger to Elton John to KISS, farewell concert tours abound, and business is booming
  8. Cher’s still going strong after decade of farewell tours
  9. Barbra Streisand: A final, final, final farewell tour?

LISTEN: Pentagram by Prefuse 73

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
